NYU students, visiting students and international students have the opportunity to earn major/minor credit or explore a new interest. During this time, students can take advantage of intensive study at one of the foremost research and teaching universities in the United States as well as have a chance to enjoy New York City during a bustling and exciting time of year.     Albert, NYU's course registration system, is where you can enroll in the courses of your choice. Use the search function on the right hand side of the course search to narrow your search by subject, session, or by open/closed class status. You may also browse the many different course listings and descriptions to see what best fits your interests.                                        Search nearly 100 course options available to you through January Term and register for them through Albert. Read More              NYU Abu Dhabi January Term   Current NYU New York and NYU Shanghai undergraduate students have the opportunity to take January Term (J-Term) courses with NYU Abu Dhabi. Courses are available in Abu Dhabi, Berlin, Buenos Aires, Florence, London, New York, Shanghai, Sydney, and Washington DC. These courses give students from NYU Abu Dhabi, NYU New York, and NYU Shanghai the opportunity to study together and experience the rich diversity of NYU's Global Network.     » Learn more                                                                          NEXT STEPS »        Tuition and Fees                                             Application Information                                               Contact Us                                                                NYU Footer          Search      Directory      Campus Map      Events      Contact Us      Site Map      Copyright and Fair Use      Feedback         Unless otherwise noted, all content copyright New York University. Oftentimes the fall and spring semesters can be overly hectic for students – a full-time course load, student club responsibilities, work, internship commitments, and social obligations. This busy time forces students to focus mainly on their academic progress which doesn’t always allow freedom to explore a new interest or take advantage of the many cultural resources that originally drew them to New York City.   January Term provides an array of courses enabling students to earn academic credit (major, minor, or elective) in courses that are in high–demand, to accelerate degree completion and to concentrate on personal interests. January Term 2015    Spring 2015     Summer 2015      Fall 2015       Registration Calendar Archive      Print View                                    Registration Calendar           January Term 2015                                                 Display of the January Term 2015 Schedule of Classes January 2015 term classes will be available in the Course Search feature of Albert beginning the week of September 29, 2014   Registration Status Students will be able to view their Registration Status for the January term using the Student Center on Albert beginning the week of September 29, 2014   Refund Schedule The refund schedule for the current academic year can be found in the Refund Schedule section of the Office of the Bursar's website     Withdrawal Schedule A grade of 'W' will be issued beginning the 4th calendar day of the session   Monday, October 20, 2014 January term Registration begins at 9:00am Eastern Daylight Time for most undergraduate, graduate, and diploma students   Tuesday, December 9, 2014 The January term tuition payment is due   Saturday, December 20, 2014 - Sunday, January 4, 2015 Student Winter Recess   No classes scheduled   Wednesday, December 24, 2014 - Sunday, January 4, 2015 Winter Recess for University Offices  The University, including the Office of the University Registrar, will be closed from Wednesday, December 24, 2014 through Sunday, January 4, 2015. During this period requests for paper transcripts and enrollment certifications will not be processed.   Sunday, January 4, 2015 Last day for all students to use Albert to add or drop January term classes   Sunday, January 4, 2015 Last day of active waitlists   Monday, January 5, 2015 January Term 2015 classes begin   Monday, January 5, 2015 The University reopens   Monday, January 5, 2015 Waitlists will be purged   Monday, January 5, 2015 All registration transactions (initial registration, dropping a class, adding a class) must be processed at the Student Services Center . Please note that prior approval/authorization from your academic advisor, Department or the Dean of your college may be required.   Monday, January 5, 2015 Last day to drop a class and receive a refund of 100% of tuition   Wednesday, January 7, 2015 The last day to drop a class without the issuance of a 'W' grade   Thursday, January 8, 2015 A grade of 'W' will be issued for students who drop a class or withdraw for the term   Monday, January 19, 2015 Martin Luther King, Jr. Day No classes scheduled / University Holiday   Friday, January 23, 2015 Last day of January Term 2015 classes  Return to top of page                           Registration Calendar           Spring 2015                                                 Display of the Spring 2015 Schedule of Classes The spring 2015 schedule of classes will be available in the Course Search feature of Albert beginning the week of October 13, 2014   Registration Status During the week of October 13, 2014 you will be able to access Registration Status information in the Student Center on Albert. You will be able to obtain the date and time that you will initially be able to enroll for spring 2015 classes, check if you require advisor clearance prior to registration, and view any negative service indicators (holds) that will prevent you from enrolling at your appointed registration date/time.   Refund Schedule The refund schedule for the current academic year can be found in the Refund Schedule section of the Office of the Bursar's website     Withdrawal Schedule The Fall / Spring Withdrawal Schedule displays when a grade of 'W' will be issued as the issuance date is based on the number of weeks in the session.     Monday, November 17, 2014 Registration Begins at 9:00 a.m. Eastern Standard Time for most Undergraduate, Graduate and Diploma students   Thursday, November 27, 2014 - Sunday, November 30, 2014 Thanksgiving Recess No classes scheduled / University Holiday   Wednesday, December 10, 2014 Legislative Day - Classes will meet according to a Monday schedule   Friday, December 12, 2014 Last day of Fall 2014 classes   Monday, December 15, 2014 - Friday, December 19, 2014 Fall 2015 Final Exams   Saturday, December 20, 2014 - Sunday, January 4, 2015 Student Winter Recess   No classes scheduled   Wednesday, December 24, 2014 - Sunday, January 4, 2015 Winter Recess for University Offices  The University, including the Office of the University Registrar, will be closed from Wednesday, December 24, 2014 through Sunday, January 4, 2015. During this period requests for paper transcripts and enrollment certifications will not be processed.   Monday, January 5, 2015 The University reopens   Tuesday, January 6, 2015 Undergraduate Spring Payment Due Failure to meet the payment deadline may result in the cancellation of class reservations   Monday, January 19, 2015 Martin Luther King, Jr. Birthday No classes scheduled / University Holiday   Friday, January 23, 2015 Last day of January Term 2015 classes   Monday, January 26, 2015 Spring 2015 classes begin   Monday, January 26, 2015 - Sunday, February 1, 2015 First week of classes   Monday, February 2, 2015 Late registration begins Initial registration between February 2, 2015 and February 22, 2015 will be charged a late registration fee. Fee for undergraduate and diploma students: $50.00 Fee for graduate students: $25.00   Monday, February 2, 2015 - Sunday, February 8, 2015 Second week of classes   Monday, February 9, 2015 Last day of active waitlists   Monday, February 9, 2015 Last day of initial registration on Albert for all students.    Last day to drop/add on Albert for all students .  Last day to drop a class and receive a refund of 100% of tuition & fees for Undergraduate, Graduate and Diploma students who are dropping classes, but will remain enrolled in at least one course. For Undergraduate, Graduate and Diploma students who 'Completely Withdraw' from ALL courses during the semester, please see the Refund Schedule for Complete Withdrawal .    Monday, February 9, 2015 - Sunday, February 15, 2015 Third week of classes   Tuesday, February 10, 2015 Waitlists will be purged   Tuesday, February 10, 2015 Courses dropped after the first two weeks of the semester: No refund of tuition or fees for Undergraduate, Graduate and Diploma students who are dropping classes, but will remain enrolled in at least one course.   Tuesday, February 10, 2015 Graduate Spring Payment Due Failure to meet the payment deadline may result in the cancellation of class reservations   Tuesday, February 10, 2015 All students who wish to perform initial registration or drop/add registration transactions must go to the Student Services Center . Please note that prior approval / authorization from your academic advisor, Department or the Dean of your college may be required.    Monday, February 16, 2015 Presidents' Day No classes scheduled / University Holiday   Tuesday, February 17, 2015 Last day to drop spring 2015 classes and not receive a grade of 'W'   Wednesday, February 18, 2015 Beginning today students will be issued a grade of 'W' if they drop a class from their spring schedule or withdraw for the term   Monday, February 23, 2015 Initial registration on or after Monday , Feburary 23rd will be charged a late registration fee.   Fee for undergraduate and diploma students: $100.00 Fee for graduate students: $50.00   Monday, March 16, 2015 - Sunday, March 22, 2015 Spring Recess No classes scheduled   Friday, April 3, 2015 Last day to use the Term Withdrawal Form to submit a spring semester term withdrawal request.   Monday, April 6, 2015 Midterm Grades Deadline   Friday, May 8, 2015 - Tuesday, May 19, 2015 Spring Semeseter Exams  Polytechnic School of Engineering - Final Exam Information  Final Grades Deadline Grades are due 72 hours after the scheduled final exam date   Monday, May 11, 2015 Last day of Spring 2015 classes   Tuesday, May 12, 2015 Reading Day   Wednesday, May 13, 2015 - Tuesday, May 19, 2015 Spring Semester Exams   College of Arts & Science   Graduate School of Arts & Science   Faculty of Arts & Science/Liberal Studies   Steinhardt School of Culture, Education, and Human Development   Leonard N. You will be able to obtain the date and time that you will initially be able to enroll for summer 2015 classes, check if you require advisor clearance prior to registration, and view any negative service indicators (holds) that will prevent you from enrolling at your appointed registration date/time.   Refund Schedule The refund schedule for the current academic year can be found in the Refund Schedule section of the Office of the Bursar's website.   Withdrawal Schedule The schedule that determines when a grade of 'W' will be issued varies by school and is based on the number of weeks in the session. Click here for the Summer / January Term Withdrawal Schedule.   Monday, January 19, 2015 Martin Luther King, Jr. Birthday No classes scheduled / University Holiday   Monday, February 16, 2015 President's Day No classes scheduled / University Holiday   Tuesday, February 17, 2015 Registration Begins at 9:00 a.m. Eastern Standard Time for most Undergraduate, Graduate and Diploma students   Tuesday, April 14, 2015 E-Bills will become available. Beginning today students will received an e-bill through their NYU e-mail account for summer term enrollment within two days of enrolling for their class.   Thursday, May 14, 2015 The summer term tuition payment is due.   Monday, May 25, 2015 Memorial Day No classes scheduled / University Holiday   Monday, May 25, 2015 Last day of active waitlists for classes scheduled during the 12-week session, the 7-week session, the first 6-week session, the first 3-week session, and the special session.   Monday, May 25, 2015 Last day to enroll on Albert for those classes scheduled during the 12-week session, the 7-week session, the first 6-week session, the first 3-week session, and the special session. Registration transactions for these sessions, after this date, must be done at the Student Services Center. Albert registration continues for classes in other Summer Sessions.   Tuesday, May 26, 2015 First day of classes: Six Week Summer Session I / 1st Quarter - Three Week Session   Saturday, June 13, 2015 Last day of classes: 1st Quarter - Three Week Session   Sunday, June 14, 2015 Last day of active waitlists for classes scheduled during the second 3-week session.   Sunday, June 14, 2015 Last day to enroll into classes scheduled during the second 3-week session on Albert. Registration transactions for this session, after this date, must be done at the Student Services Center.   Monday, June 15, 2015 First day of classes: 2nd Quarter - Three Week Session   Thursday, July 2, 2015 Last day of classes: Six Week Summer Session I / 2nd Quarter - Three Week Session   Friday, July 3, 2015 Independence Day No classes scheduled / University Holiday   Sunday, July 5, 2015 Last day of active waitlists for classes scheduled during the second 6-week session and the third 3-week session.   Sunday, July 5, 2015 Last day to enroll into classes scheduled during the second 6-week session and the third 3-week session on Albert. Registration transactions for these sessions after this date must be done at the Student Services Center.   Monday, July 6, 2015 First day of classes: Six Week Summer Session II / 3rd Quarter - Three Week Session   Saturday, July 11, 2015 Classes scheduled during the 7-week session end.   Saturday, July 25, 2015 Last day of classes: 3rd Quarter - Three Week Session   Sunday, July 26, 2015 Last day of active waitlists for classes scheduled during the fourth 3-week session.   Sunday, July 26, 2015 Last day to enroll into classes scheduled during the fourth 3-week session on Albert. Registration transactions for this session, after this date, must be done at the Student Services Center.   Monday, July 27, 2015 First day of classes: 4th Quarter - Three Week Session   Saturday, August 15, 2015 Last day of classes: Six Week Summer Session II / 4th Quarter - Three Week Session Final Grades Deadline. Grades are due 72 hours after the scheduled final exam date. Registration Status During the week of March 23, 2015 you will be able to access Registration Status information in the Student Center on Albert. You will be able to obtain the date and time that you will initially be able to enroll for fall 2015 classes, check if you require advisor clearance prior to registration, and view any negative service indicators (holds) that will prevent you from enrolling at your appointed registration date/time. Monday, November 2, 2015 Last day to use the Term Withdrawal Form to submit a fall semester term withdrawal request or submit a request to withdraw from a course. Students should consult the academic calendar of their home school for specific deadlines pertaining to course withdrawal for the term. Oftentimes the fall and spring semesters can be overly hectic for students – a full-time course load, student club responsibilities, work, internship commitments, and social obligations. This busy time forces students to focus mainly on their academic progress which doesn’t always allow freedom to explore a new interest or take advantage of the many cultural resources that originally drew them to New York City.   January Term provides an array of courses enabling students to earn academic credit (major, minor, or elective) in courses that are in high–demand, to accelerate degree completion and to concentrate on personal interests. January Term 2015    Spring 2015     Summer 2015      Fall 2015       Registration Calendar Archive      Print View                                    Registration Calendar           January Term 2015                                                 Display of the January Term 2015 Schedule of Classes January 2015 term classes will be available in the Course Search feature of Albert beginning the week of September 29, 2014   Registration Status Students will be able to view their Registration Status for the January term using the Student Center on Albert beginning the week of September 29, 2014   Refund Schedule The refund schedule for the current academic year can be found in the Refund Schedule section of the Office of the Bursar's website     Withdrawal Schedule A grade of 'W' will be issued beginning the 4th calendar day of the session   Monday, October 20, 2014 January term Registration begins at 9:00am Eastern Daylight Time for most undergraduate, graduate, and diploma students   Tuesday, December 9, 2014 The January term tuition payment is due   Saturday, December 20, 2014 - Sunday, January 4, 2015 Student Winter Recess   No classes scheduled   Wednesday, December 24, 2014 - Sunday, January 4, 2015 Winter Recess for University Offices  The University, including the Office of the University Registrar, will be closed from Wednesday, December 24, 2014 through Sunday, January 4, 2015. During this period requests for paper transcripts and enrollment certifications will not be processed.   Sunday, January 4, 2015 Last day for all students to use Albert to add or drop January term classes   Sunday, January 4, 2015 Last day of active waitlists   Monday, January 5, 2015 January Term 2015 classes begin   Monday, January 5, 2015 The University reopens   Monday, January 5, 2015 Waitlists will be purged   Monday, January 5, 2015 All registration transactions (initial registration, dropping a class, adding a class) must be processed at the Student Services Center . Please note that prior approval/authorization from your academic advisor, Department or the Dean of your college may be required.   Monday, January 5, 2015 Last day to drop a class and receive a refund of 100% of tuition   Wednesday, January 7, 2015 The last day to drop a class without the issuance of a 'W' grade   Thursday, January 8, 2015 A grade of 'W' will be issued for students who drop a class or withdraw for the term   Monday, January 19, 2015 Martin Luther King, Jr. Day No classes scheduled / University Holiday   Friday, January 23, 2015 Last day of January Term 2015 classes  Return to top of page                           Registration Calendar           Spring 2015                                                 Display of the Spring 2015 Schedule of Classes The spring 2015 schedule of classes will be available in the Course Search feature of Albert beginning the week of October 13, 2014   Registration Status During the week of October 13, 2014 you will be able to access Registration Status information in the Student Center on Albert. You will be able to obtain the date and time that you will initially be able to enroll for spring 2015 classes, check if you require advisor clearance prior to registration, and view any negative service indicators (holds) that will prevent you from enrolling at your appointed registration date/time.
